promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi cute rare bear fighting-type pokemon with regal claws. It can be found in ruins-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or bear. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Ruinclaw, a a chibi cute rare bear fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in ruins-like environments It has the following abilities: Spirited Throw, Whump. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bear", "fighting" or "Ruinclaw". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, bear-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Amidst ancient debris, this peppy brute hones its prowess. Known for its playful toss, Ruinclaw's Whump sends foes skyward in a pitfall of charm.
